text:
By design there are different things that are far from ideal in regard to ADMX
management. This is also because some Microsoft Products do not follow the
correct naming and folder structure and each has different ways how to provide
ADMX templates. 
Summarized it here:
https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/onedrive/reorganize-onedrive-admx-template-folders-to-match-msft/m-p/2119259/highlight/true#M8272
 
You can use EvergreenADMX Powershell to make your life easier.
https://github.com/msfreaks/EvergreenAdmx
 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant
Microsoft MVP – Azure Hybrid & Migrate / Windows Server 
Von: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement <

metadata.topic: Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.email_text_original:
Sie erhalten nicht oft eine E-Mail von mailtome@chynet.de. Erfahren Sie, warum
dies wichtig ist [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
By design there are different things that are far from ideal in regard to ADMX
management. This is also because some Microsoft Products do not follow the
correct naming and folder structure and each has different ways how to provide
ADMX templates. 
Summarized it here:
